title: Design Strategies for Sociocultural Interaction in International Mobility Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary cross-cultural communication understanding and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Aims to improve sociocultural learning outcomes of short-term international exchange programs for graduate students in scientific fields. Emphasizes online cultural understanding and collaborative learning

learning_goals: Identify three or more intercultural perceptual biases through case analyses reflecting local cultural perspectives
Collaboratively design and execute projects with local learners using online collaboration tools (Padlet, Jamboard, etc.)
Evaluate personal sociocultural interaction strategies and propose improvements through reflective journaling and feedback sessions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
